column5: Relax, unwind and enjoy an open water setting ready for your get-a-way! Shade trees, covered patio & large fenced backyard to the lake allows you to catch the perfect sunsets. The spacious dock allows for plenty of room to fish, keep your boat or water toys tied up or to just to watch the birds fly by and the fish jump.
column8: Anchored Away on Lake Granbury - Open Water Home
